name: @genx/model
description: Meta programming DSL specially for automating database structure creation and data access.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.cover: npm run build:test && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha test/*.mocha.js --recursive src/**/*.spec.js --timeout 5000
scripts.build: npm run bulid:clean && NODE_ENV=development babel src -d lib --copy-files && del lib/**/__test__
scripts.build:prod: npm run bulid:clean && NODE_ENV=production babel src -d lib --copy-files && del lib/**/__test__
scripts.build:test: npm run bulid:clean && NODE_ENV=test babel src -d lib --copy-files && del lib/**/__test__
scripts.test:build: npm run jison && OOL_DBG=1 node test/build.adhoc.js

author: Rockie Guo <rockie@kitmi.com.au>
